passage_text: [ 3 syll. aa-mi-na, aam-ina ] The baby girl name Aamina is pronounced as aa-M IH N-aa-or aa-M IY-N-aa- †. Aamina is used chiefly in Arabic, English, and Indian, and its origin is Arabic. It is derived from the element 'amina' which is of the meaning feel safe. The name was borne by the mother of the prophet Mohammed. In addition, Aamina is a variant of the name Amina (African, Arabic, English, and Swahili) in the Arabic, English, and Indian languages. Aamina is uncommon as a baby name for girls. It is not listed within the top 1000 names.

Aamina is generally used as a girl's name. It consists of 6 letters and 3 syllables and is pronounced Aa-mi-na. In the U.S. in 2014, it ranked 6650 in baby name popularity for girls with 18 occurrences. Less than 5 boys were given the name.

The name Amina is an African baby name. In African the meaning of the name Amina is: Trustworthy. Arabic Meaning: The name Amina is an Arabic baby name. In Arabic the meaning of the name Amina is: Trustworthy. American Meaning: The name Amina is an American baby name. In American the meaning of the name Amina is: Trustworthy. Muslim Meaning: The name Amina is a Muslim baby name. In Muslim the meaning of the name Amina is: Trustworthy. Reliable.

Last year this name was ranked as one of the top 1000 most popular names within its gender. Keep in mind how popular a name is. Your child may feel that they fit in more with a more popular name. On the other hand, they may feel more special if their name is less popular and more uniquely their own.
